channel.title: Magic Picture.....?
channel.description:
Magic Picture.....? Ok, So I'm watching a movie in firefox and I want to send a pic of the vid to someone on msn. I click print screen and all that shows up on msn is a black screen. But when I paste it into paint it turns into a video. When I save it, it keeps on playing. When I change the video I'm playing in firefox, it changes video... Strange.. You should try it..
Download the attachment and play a video in firefox (avi files). While the video is playing, so will the pic.

item.title: Magic Picture.....?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:3, topic:212911”][quote author=cooper link=topic=280353.msg2279726#msg2279726 date=1213623301]
You’re in overlay mixer rendering mode [don’t remember exact name].
[/quote]
It also works with VLC[/quote]
I don’t really use VLC/firefox for movies too often, but if you try Media Player Classic [google klcp], you can change the settings in there to use a few different renderers that allow you to take screenshots [sorry, but I do not know much about this topic :(].

Read full topic

item.title: Magic Picture.....?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Magic Picture…?
Ok, So I’m watching a movie in firefox and I want to send a pic of the vid to someone on msn.
I click print screen and all that shows up on msn is a black screen.
But when I paste it into paint it turns into a video. When I save it, it keeps on playing. When I change the video I’m playing in firefox, it changes video…
Strange… You should try it…

Download the attachment and play a video in firefox (avi files).
While the video is playing, so will the pic.

Read full topic
